publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1549.1 Alex Johnstone: Transport—As an amendment to motion (S3M-1549) in the name of Jeremy Purvis, leave out from "reaffirms" to end and insert "notes the decision to progress the Borders railway taken by the Parliament on 14 June 2006; regrets the delay in construction and the substantial increases in costs since the project’s inception, and calls on the Scottish Government to work with Transport Scotland and the relevant local authorities to ensure that the project is completed as quickly and cost effectively as possible."
